perks.name: Agile Defender
perks.description: 1: Increase armor rating for light aromor by 20%. 2: Increase armor rating for light aromor by 40%. 3: Increase armor rating for light aromor by 60%. 4: Increase armor rating for light aromor by 80%. 5: Increase armor rating for light aromor by 100%.

perks.name: Custom Fit
perks.description: 25% armor bonus if wearing all light armor: head, chest, hands, feet.

perks.name: Unhindered
perks.description: Light Armor weights nothing and doesn't slow you down when worn.

perks.name: Stealth
perks.description: 1: You are 20% harder to detect when sneaking. 2: You are 25% harder to detect when sneaking. 3: You are 30% harder to detect when sneaking. 4: You are 35% harder to detect when sneaking. 5: You are 40% harder to detect when sneaking.

perks.name: Backstab
perks.description: Sneak attacks with one=handed weapons now do six times damage.

perks.name: Deadly Aim
perks.description: Sneak attacks with bows now do three times damage.

perks.name: Novice Locks
perks.description: Novice locks are much easier to pick

perks.name: Apprentice Locks
perks.description: Apprentice locks are much easier to pick.

perks.name: Quick Hands
perks.description: Able to pick locks without being noticed.
